snippet.title: Vendetta Online HD short trailer - Space MMORPG for Mac, Windows, Linux and Android.
snippet.description:
http://www.vendetta-online.com

This is the short trailer for Vendetta Online, a space MMO available for Linux, Windows, Mac and Android. Currently celebrating its five-year anniversary (launched in 2004), the game brings together diverse play-styles in a unique manner; while the development team and player base continually discuss the design and direction of upcoming content. For more information about this MMORPG, see our website:

http://www.vendetta-online.com

Or find us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Vendetta-Online/112211466226

And Twitter:
http://twitter.com/VendettaOnline

..and coming soon to the Xperia PLAY!
